resources.string: SendSMS allows you to sync your text messages with your computer with the corresponding computer client. Your data stays within the same network as the computer you\'re synced to.

SendSMS must be enabled and given the proper permissions to work:\n - SMS permissions to be told when you get or send messages\n - Contacts to match the texts with the person you\'re messaging - Internet to then send this to your computer over the local network
Permissions are required to forward texts
Enable permissions in Settings to continue
